name: Online Loan Application System
description: A system that allows customers to apply for personal, home, and auto loans online. It includes application processing, document uploads, and integration with credit score APIs for eligibility checks.

name: Fraud Detection System
description: A system that monitors transaction data to detect potentially fraudulent activities in real-time using machine learning algorithms and transaction history analysis.

name: Customer Onboarding Portal
description: A portal that streamlines the onboarding process for new customers. It allows identity verification using KYC/AML procedures and digital signatures for document approvals.

name: Mobile Banking App
description: A mobile banking app that provides customers with access to their accounts, transaction history, fund transfers, and bill payments. It also integrates with mobile payment gateways and supports multi-factor authentication.
